text: Trick or Treat Haunted houses, Curdling screams, Freezing bats, torn at the seams! Full white moon, Dripping candles, Roaming forgetful zombie vandals! Gnarled old trees, Tossed in breeze. Cold ghosts shivering, knocking their knees! Trick and treating, From door to door, Not enough sweets, I must have more!!! by Gareth Lancaster the
